turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, sorry to bother you. Can you please pick me up a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Where would you like me to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Inside the Target on Stellhorn Road in Fort Wayne.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I'll get that for you. What kind of coffee do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What kind of milk do you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Any toppings like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, whipped cream would be great thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's no problem at all. I'm going to order it for you right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I have placed the order. It should be done shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you pick it up for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I planned on it. Was a receipt notification sent to your phone?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I got it just now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great, I'm going to head over and pick up the drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye!
